text: Gumazitam mɨdorozim damuva apanim abɨragh, egh korotiar ghurghurir kamagh garitam arughtɨ kɨ an ziam akɨnafarir God gumazamizir ikɨrɨmɨrir zurara itim iniamin ziaba osirizim, kɨ an ziam angarighan kogham. Puvatɨ. Kɨ uan afeziam ko an enselbar damazibar gumazir kamɨn gun mɨkɨm suam, a konanam.
